description: Returns information about a request to generate a bot through natural language description, made through the StartBotResource API. Use the generatedBotLocaleUrl to retrieve the Amazon S3 object containing the bot locale configuration. You can then modify and import this configuration.

parameters.name: botId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the bot for which to return the generation details.

parameters.name: botVersion
parameters.description: The version of the bot for which to return the generation details.

parameters.name: localeId
parameters.description: The locale of the bot for which to return the generation details.

parameters.name: generationId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the generation request for which to return the generation details.

nested_items.name: botId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the bot for which the generation request was made.

nested_items.name: botVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the bot for which the generation request was made.

nested_items.name: localeId
nested_items.description: The locale of the bot for which the generation request was made.

nested_items.name: generationId
nested_items.description: The generation ID for which to return the generation details.

nested_items.name: failureReasons
nested_items.description: A list of reasons why the generation of bot resources through natural language description failed.

nested_items.name: generationStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the generation request.

nested_items.name: generationInputPrompt
nested_items.description: The prompt used in the generation request.

nested_items.name: generatedBotLocaleUrl
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 location of the generated bot locale configuration.

nested_items.name: creationDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time at which the item was generated.

nested_items.name: modelArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the model used to generate the bot resources.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time at which the generated item was updated.
